statements: SELECT * FROM security_assessment;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM security_assessment WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT assessment_name, vulnerability_count FROM security_assessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT assessment_name, vulnerability_count FROM security_assessment WHERE remediation_status = TRUE ORDER BY vulnerability_count DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM security_assessment WHERE vulnerability_count > 10 AND remediation_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM security_assessment ORDER BY assessment_date DESC, vulnerability_count ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name FROM security_assessment WHERE remediation_status = TRUE ORDER BY assessment_name ASC
SELECT assessment_name, vulnerability_count AS 'Number of Vulnerabilities' FROM security_assessment WHERE assessment_date > '2021-01-01' AND remediation_status = FALSE
SELECT AVG(vulnerability_count) AS 'Average Vulnerability Count' FROM security_assessment WHERE assessment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM security_assessment WHERE assessment_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date, assessment_description FROM security_assessments;
SELECT * FROM security_assessments WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name FROM security_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_description FROM security_assessments WHERE assessment_description LIKE '%vulnerability%';
SELECT scan_id, scan_date FROM vulnerability_scans ORDER BY scan_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_assessments WHERE assessment_id = 1;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_description FROM security_assessments WHERE assessment_date >= '2022-03-01';
SELECT scan_date, scan_results->'vulnerabilities' AS vulnerabilities FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_status = 'completed';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, assessment_date, assessment_description FROM security_assessments WHERE assessment_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT scan_id, scan_date, scan_results->>'scan_type' AS scan_type FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM security_assessments;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_score FROM security_assessments;
SELECT assessment_date, assessment_score FROM security_assessments WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_scans ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT scan_type, vulnerabilities_found FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE vulnerabilities_found > 10;
SELECT * FROM security_assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, assessment_score FROM security_assessments ORDER BY assessment_score DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM remediation_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending';
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, assessment_date, assessment_score FROM security_assessments WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT scan_id, scan_date, scan_type FROM vulnerability_scans ORDER BY scan_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_assessments;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, assessment_date FROM security_assessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT scan_name, scan_type, scan_results FROM vulnerability_scans WHERE scan_date='2022-10-15';
SELECT result_id, assessment_id, scan_id, risk_level FROM assessment_results WHERE risk_level='High' ORDER BY result_id ASC;
SELECT action_id, action_description, action_status, completion_date FROM remediation_actions WHERE action_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM security_assessments;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_date FROM security_assessments WHERE severity_level='High';
SELECT DISTINCT assessment_type FROM security_assessments;
SELECT scan_name, scan_date, LEFT(scan_results, 50) AS shortened_results FROM vulnerability_scans;
SELECT ar.result_id, ar.assessment_id, ar.risk_level, ra.action_description FROM assessment_results ar JOIN remediation_actions ra ON ar.result_id = ra.result_id WHERE ar.risk_level='High';
SELECT * FROM SecurityAssessments ORDER BY assessment_date DESC;
SELECT assessment_name, assessment_score FROM SecurityAssessments WHERE assessment_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM VulnerabilityScans WHERE severity_level = 'High' LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM Users WHERE last_login_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_description, task_priority FROM RemediationTasks ORDER BY task_priority;
SELECT assessment_id, assessment_name, assessment_date FROM SecurityAssessments;
SELECT task_id, task_description, task_status, task_priority FROM RemediationTasks WHERE task_priority > 2;
SELECT * FROM VulnerabilityScans WHERE scan_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY scan_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_role FROM Users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT remediation_id, task_id, completed_date, remarks FROM RemediationHistory ORDER BY completed_date ASC;
